content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
went last week with two friends and food was really good. however when we arrived to get seated they just kept ignoring us walking past us until a gentleman finally sat us. they wouldn't go near us to call them over the entire time we were there. lastly, once we were about done eating, one of our friends was clearly still reaching out of her dish to eat when the waiter comes and snatches her plate away and said "everyone done?"she didn't have a chance to finish her food, he was being super rudeafter the plate snatching he still suggested us to give him a huge tip.also this place is quite noisy
